A good combination of Horror, Stealth, Survival games, for those who are indeed of age, or have seen Youtuber/Twitch Streamers play this game I recommend getting it yourself, the DLC is worth getting for the new survivors/killers and perks, but not required for the new maps. It is a great game keeping Survivors on the edge of their seats on their objectives, and at times a worthy challenge for the killers (Though and myself included in these, there have been good Killers who let the Survivors go) 10/10 from me

Literally competitive hide and seek but with throwing axes, chainsaws, and sinkholes to the butt hole dimension. Great game, great devs, the DLC system might seem like too much until you realize that the maps and updates are released for free, the game has seen regular reworking and rebalancing of different systems, introductions of new mechanics, and a general health post launch life. I'm buying a DLC right now, not because it'll give me an edge, but because it has neat new gameplay elements and I feel the devs deserve the support. Even if you're still sketch, and don't want to take some random jackwagon's opinion on the matter, the game and 90% of its DLC go on sale every spooktober so just wait and buy it for pennies on the dollar.

This game is Absolutely amazing, It is incredibly fun to play with friends, and Has a extremely well thought out concept. You also actually get rewarded for playing, when you play you can Upgrade you survivors or your killers. You get these things called perks and there is so much you can do with them. You can also prestige your characters which even gives you more things to do, and there cosmetics are fantastic. I can play this game for hours on end, without getting bored. They constantly make new updates making the game fresh and new. There is also a couple of times when playing this game when I could not stop laughing, and this game is not meant to be taken to seriously, just to have fun. I definately recommend this game, it is just overall amazing. <3
